alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Logan; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 8:25PM CDT until June 03 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wichita County in west central Kansas... Southeastern Wallace County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Logan County in west central Kansas... Greeley County in west central Kansas... * Until 800 PM MDT/900 PM CDT/. * At 725 PM MDT/825 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Sharon Springs to 14 miles south of Tribune, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of western Wichita, southeastern Wallace, southwestern Logan and Greeley Counties, including the following locations... Selkirk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
